review: I am sooooo happy that I purchased the fire stick! I love it!

review: I like my first one so much, I ordered two more for my other TV's.  Fast, and I love it syncs with my tablet and phones....I hope they sync it with the Echo also.....
author: Rex Baldwin

review: Great little device! Very easy to setup and the picture is HD. Can't beat the price and has alot apps as to apple TV that has far less.
author: Vince volz

review: Perfect for my travel schedule.  Easy to use.  Love it.

review: I can't say enough good things about the fire stick.  It is so convenient and really easy to understand.  The home screen allows you to go just where you want with no hassle. The best thing is there is no more buffering.  Just love it and it changed my life.

review: I love it! It's great because I don't have smart t.v so this lets me stream everything on my t.v.

review: So far everything is great. Thanks for your concern
